title: EPIC-006: CI/CD Pipeline - GitHub Actions

epic.title: Infrastructure - Observability, CI/CD, Runtime, Secrets
epic.goal: Set up production infrastructure: containerization, Kubernetes/ECS deployment, CI/CD pipeline, centralized logging, metrics, alerting, secret management

deliverables: Production-ready implementation strictly for this story scope
Automated tests required by acceptance criteria
Minimal documentation/README updates required to run/test the change
acceptance_criteria: GitHub Actions workflow on push to main/release branch
Jobs: lint (ruff/black), test (pytest with coverage >80%), build (Docker image), deploy (staging on main, prod on release tag)
Secrets in GitHub vault: DOCKER_REGISTRY_TOKEN, DB_PASSWORD, OPENAI_API_KEY, etc.
Image scanning (Trivy or Snyk) for vulnerabilities
Deploy job triggers on test success
Rollback on failed health check (optional for v1, document)
description: Set up CI/CD pipeline with GitHub Actions: run tests, lint, build Docker image, push to registry, deploy to staging/prod.
